iana.template_text:
(registered 2017-09-08, last updated 2017-09-08)

Media type name: application

Media subtype name: vnd.ecip.rlp

Required parameters: No required parameters.

Optional parameters: No optional parameters.

Encoding considerations: binary

Security considerations: Security issues associated with this type 
   have not been assessed.

Interoperability considerations: This media type (RLP encoding) is 
   universal inter-operable in all Ethereum and Ethereum Classic 
   clients.

Published specification:

   Ethereum Yellow Paper
   (https://ethereum.github.io/yellowpaper/paper.pdf) Appendix B: 
   Recursive Length Prefix

Applications which use this media: This media type is used by 
   go-ethereum (Ethereum Classic version) and many other Ethereum and 
   Ethereum Classic clients.

Fragment identifier considerations: None

Restrictions on usage: None

Additional information:

   1. Deprecated alias names for this type: None
   2. Magic number(s): None
   3. File extension(s): None
   4. Macintosh file type code: None
   5. Object Identifiers: Not used

General Comments:

Person to contact for further information:

   1. Name: Wei Tang
   2. Email: hi&that.world

Intended usage: Common

   Used by Ethereum and Ethereum Classic clients for interchanging 
   information of blocks, transactions and accounts.

Author/Change controller: Wei Tang, on behalf of Ethereum Classic 
   Improvement Proposals.
